thread.title: William Hamilton Jr
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by William Hamilton Jr

author: William Hamilton Jr
title: William Hamilton Jr
text: I haven't done furniture shopping in years and Will at the Gardner White in Macomb, Michigan made everything very simple and stress free. My wife and I are very happy with our new furniture and bed. I will go to Gardner White in the future for sure.
